Controllers

Class MedicalRecordController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.MedicalRecordController

  • public class MedicalRecordController
extends java.lang.Object
    The medicalRecordController contains all the methods necessary to create new visit , treatment , and Examination and to save them in database,this class connect the GUI to server and the database
    Author:
    maisam marjieh
